name: Albert Einstein
newbio: Albert Einstein was born in Germany where he began his schooling in Munich.  Albert furthered his education and began teaching in 1905 after receiving his Doctorate degree.  Einstein always had the solution to any problem regarding physics, and often used his own methods.  He was offered presidency of Isreal at one point, however, he declined the offer.  Einstein retired in 1945 in the U.S., after gaining citizenship in 1940.
